abstract: Novartis, the giant Swiss drugmaker, said Monday that it would take control of the eye-care company Alcon by buying Nestlé’s majority stake for $28.1 billion, raising its own stake to 77 percent, and said it would like to acquire the rest.

headline.main: Novartis to Buy Majority of Alcon From Nestlé
